ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: 1. Blacks should strive to be full members of the American political system.
Notes: 1=Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Moderately Disagree; 4= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5=Moderately Agree; 6=Agree; 7=Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: 2. Blacks should try to work within the system to achieve their political and economic goals.
Notes: 1=Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Moderately Disagree; 4= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5=Moderately Agree; 6=Agree; 7=Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: 3. Blacks should strive to integrate all institutions that are segregated.
Notes: 1=Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Moderately Disagree; 4= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5=Moderately Agree; 6=Agree; 7=Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: 4. Blacks should feel free to interact socially with White people.
Notes: 1=Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Moderately Disagree; 4= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5=Moderately Agree; 6=Agree; 7=Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: 5. Overall, being Black has very little to do with how I feel about myself.
Notes: 1=Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Moderately Disagree; 4= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5=Moderately Agree; 6=Agree; 7=Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: 6. I have a strong sense of belonging to Black People.
Notes: 1=Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Moderately Disagree; 4= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5=Moderately Agree; 6=Agree; 7=Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: 7. I have a strong attachment to other Black People.
Notes: 1=Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Moderately Disagree; 4= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5=Moderately Agree; 6=Agree; 7=Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: 8. Being Black is an important reflection of who I am.
Notes: 1=Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Moderately Disagree; 4= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5=Moderately Agree; 6=Agree; 7=Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: 9. Blacks should have the choice to marry interracially.
Notes: 1=Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Moderately Disagree; 4= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5=Moderately Agree; 6=Agree; 7=Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: 10. Blacks would be better off if they were more concerned with the problems facing all people than just focusing on Black issues.
Notes: 1=Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Moderately Disagree; 4= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5=Moderately Agree; 6=Agree; 7=Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: 11. Being an individual is more important than identifying oneself as Black.
Notes: 1=Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Moderately Disagree; 4= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5=Moderately Agree; 6=Agree; 7=Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: 12. Blacks should judge Whites as individuals and not as members of the White race.
Notes: 1=Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Moderately Disagree; 4= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5=Moderately Agree; 6=Agree; 7=Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: 13. It is important for Black people to surround their children with Black art, music and literature.
Notes: 1=Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Moderately Disagree; 4= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5=Moderately Agree; 6=Agree; 7=Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: 14. Blacks would be better off if they adopted Afrocentric values.
Notes: 1=Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Moderately Disagree; 4= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5=Moderately Agree; 6=Agree; 7=Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: 15. Black people must organize themselves into a separate Black political force.
Notes: 1=Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Moderately Disagree; 4= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5=Moderately Agree; 6=Agree; 7=Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: 16. Whenever possible, Blacks should buy from other Black businesses.
Notes: 1=Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Moderately Disagree; 4= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5=Moderately Agree; 6=Agree; 7=Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: 17. The same forces which have led to the oppression of Blacks have also led to the oppression of other groups.
Notes: 1=Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Moderately Disagree; 4= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5=Moderately Agree; 6=Agree; 7=Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: 18. The struggle for Black liberation in America should be closely related to the struggle of other oppressed groups.
Notes: 1=Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Moderately Disagree; 4= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5=Moderately Agree; 6=Agree; 7=Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: 19. The racism Blacks have experienced is similar to that of other minority groups.
Notes: 1=Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Moderately Disagree; 4= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5=Moderately Agree; 6=Agree; 7=Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: 20. There are other people who experience racial injustice and indignities similar to Black Americans.
Notes: 1=Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Moderately Disagree; 4= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5=Moderately Agree; 6=Agree; 7=Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: 21. I feel good about Black people.
Notes: 1=Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Moderately Disagree; 4= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5=Moderately Agree; 6=Agree; 7=Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: 22. I am happy that I am Black.
Notes: 1=Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Moderately Disagree; 4= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5=Moderately Agree; 6=Agree; 7=Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: 23. I am proud to be Black.
Notes: 1=Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Moderately Disagree; 4= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5=Moderately Agree; 6=Agree; 7=Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: 24. Overall, Blacks are considered good by others.
Notes: 1=Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Moderately Disagree; 4= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5=Moderately Agree; 6=Agree; 7=Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: 25. In general, others respect Black people.
Notes: 1=Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Moderately Disagree; 4= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5=Moderately Agree; 6=Agree; 7=Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: 26. In general, other groups view Blacks in a positive manner.
Notes: 1=Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Moderately Disagree; 4= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5=Moderately Agree; 6=Agree; 7=Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: 27. Society views Black people as an asset.
Notes: 1=Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Moderately Disagree; 4= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5=Moderately Agree; 6=Agree; 7=Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: People think that African Americans are as good as people from other ethnicities/cultures.
Notes: 1= Really Disagree; 2= Kind of Disagree; 3= Neutral; 4= Kind of Agree; 5= Really Agree

ElementDescription: People from other races think that African Americans have made important contributions.
Notes: 1= Really Disagree; 2= Kind of Disagree; 3= Neutral; 4= Kind of Agree; 5= Really Agree

ElementDescription: Black parents should surround their children with Black art and Black books.
Notes: 1= Really Disagree; 2= Kind of Disagree; 3= Neutral; 4= Kind of Agree; 5= Really Agree

ElementDescription: Whenever possible, Blacks should buy from Black businesses.
Notes: 1= Really Disagree; 2= Kind of Disagree; 3= Neutral; 4= Kind of Agree; 5= Really Agree

ElementDescription: Blacks should support Black entertainment by going to Black movies and watching Black TV shows.
Notes: 1= Really Disagree; 2= Kind of Disagree; 3= Neutral; 4= Kind of Agree; 5= Really Agree

ElementDescription: Being an individual is more important than identifying yourself as Black.
Notes: 1= Really Disagree; 2= Kind of Disagree; 3= Neutral; 4= Kind of Agree; 5= Really Agree

ElementDescription: Blacks should think of themselves as individuals, not as Blacks.
Notes: 1= Really Disagree; 2= Kind of Disagree; 3= Neutral; 4= Kind of Agree; 5= Really Agree

ElementDescription: Black people should not consider ethnicity/culture when deciding what movies to go see.
Notes: 1= Really Disagree; 2= Kind of Disagree; 3= Neutral; 4= Kind of Agree; 5= Really Agree

ElementDescription: It is important that Blacks go to White Schools so that they can learn how to act around Whites.
Notes: 1= Really Disagree; 2= Kind of Disagree; 3= Neutral; 4= Kind of Agree; 5= Really Agree

ElementDescription: I think it is important for Blacks not to act Black around White people.
Notes: 1= Really Disagree; 2= Kind of Disagree; 3= Neutral; 4= Kind of Agree; 5= Really Agree

ElementDescription: Blacks should act more like Whites to be successful in this society.
Notes: 1= Really Disagree; 2= Kind of Disagree; 3= Neutral; 4= Kind of Agree; 5= Really Agree

ElementDescription: People of all minority groups should stick together and fight discrimination.
Notes: 1= Really Disagree; 2= Kind of Disagree; 3= Neutral; 4= Kind of Agree; 5= Really Agree

ElementDescription: There are other people who experience discrimination similar to Blacks.
Notes: 1= Really Disagree; 2= Kind of Disagree; 3= Neutral; 4= Kind of Agree; 5= Really Agree

ElementDescription: Blacks should spend less time focusing on how we differ from other minority groups and more time focusing on how we are similar to people from other minority groups.
Notes: 1= Really Disagree; 2= Kind of Disagree; 3= Neutral; 4= Kind of Agree; 5= Really Agree

ElementDescription: I feel close to other Black people.
Notes: 1= Really Disagree; 2= Kind of Disagree; 3= Neutral; 4= Kind of Agree; 5= Really Agree

ElementDescription: I have a strong sense of belonging to other Black people.
Notes: 1= Really Disagree; 2= Kind of Disagree; 3= Neutral; 4= Kind of Agree; 5= Really Agree

ElementDescription: If I were to describe myself to someone, one of the first things that I would say is that I'm Black.
Notes: 1= Really Disagree; 2= Kind of Disagree; 3= Neutral; 4= Kind of Agree; 5= Really Agree

ElementDescription: I am happy that I am Black.
Notes: 1= Really Disagree; 2= Kind of Disagree; 3= Neutral; 4= Kind of Agree; 5= Really Agree

ElementDescription: I am proud to be Black.
Notes: 1= Really Disagree; 2= Kind of Disagree; 3= Neutral; 4= Kind of Agree; 5= Really Agree

ElementDescription: I feel good about Black people.
Notes: 1= Really Disagree; 2= Kind of Disagree; 3= Neutral; 4= Kind of Agree; 5= Really Agree

ElementDescription: Most people think that African Americans are as smart as people of other ethnicities/cultures.
Notes: 1= Really Disagree; 2= Kind of Disagree; 3= Neutral; 4= Kind of Agree; 5= Really Agree

ElementDescription: Most people consider Blacks , on the average, to be more ineffective than other racial groups.
Notes: 1=Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Moderately Disagree; 4= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5=Moderately Agree; 6=Agree; 7=Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: A sign of progress is that Blacks are in the mainstream of America more than ever before.
Notes: 1=Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Moderately Disagree; 4= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5=Moderately Agree; 6=Agree; 7=Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: A thorough knowledge of Black history is very important for Blacks today.
Notes: 1=Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Moderately Disagree; 4= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5=Moderately Agree; 6=Agree; 7=Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: Blacks and Whites can never live in true harmony because of racial differences.
Notes: 1=Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Moderately Disagree; 4= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5=Moderately Agree; 6=Agree; 7=Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: Black values should not be inconsistent with human values.
Notes: 1=Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Moderately Disagree; 4= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5=Moderately Agree; 6=Agree; 7=Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: I often regret that I am Black.
Notes: 1=Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Moderately Disagree; 4= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5=Moderately Agree; 6=Agree; 7=Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: White people can never be trusted where Blacks are concerned.
Notes: 1=Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Moderately Disagree; 4= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5=Moderately Agree; 6=Agree; 7=Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: Blacks and Whites have more commonalities than differences.
Notes: 1=Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Moderately Disagree; 4= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5=Moderately Agree; 6=Agree; 7=Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: Black people should not consider race when buying art or selecting a book to read.
Notes: 1=Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Moderately Disagree; 4= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5=Moderately Agree; 6=Agree; 7=Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: We are all children of a higher being, therefore, we should love people of all races.
Notes: 1=Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Moderately Disagree; 4= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5=Moderately Agree; 6=Agree; 7=Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: People regardless of their race have strengths and limitations.
Notes: 1=Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Moderately Disagree; 4= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5=Moderately Agree; 6=Agree; 7=Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: Blacks should learn about the oppression of other groups.
Notes: 1=Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Moderately Disagree; 4= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5=Moderately Agree; 6=Agree; 7=Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: Because America is predominantly White, it is important that Blacks go to White schools so they can gain experience interacting with Whites.
Notes: 1=Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Moderately Disagree; 4= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5=Moderately Agree; 6=Agree; 7=Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: Black people should treat other oppressed people as allies.
Notes: 1=Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Moderately Disagree; 4= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5=Moderately Agree; 6=Agree; 7=Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: Blacks should view themselves as being Americans first and foremost.
Notes: 1=Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Moderately Disagree; 4= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5=Moderately Agree; 6=Agree; 7=Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: The plight of Blacks in America will improve only when Blacks are in important positions within the system.
Notes: 1=Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Moderately Disagree; 4= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5=Moderately Agree; 6=Agree; 7=Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: Blacks will be more successful in achieving their goals if they form coalitions with other oppressed groups.
Notes: 1=Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Moderately Disagree; 4= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5=Moderately Agree; 6=Agree; 7=Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: Blacks should try to become friends with people from other oppressed groups.
Notes: 1=Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Moderately Disagree; 4= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5=Moderately Agree; 6=Agree; 7=Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: The dominant society devalues anything not White male oriented.
Notes: 1=Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Moderately Disagree; 4= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5=Moderately Agree; 6=Agree; 7=Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: Being Black is not a major factor in my social relationships.
Notes: 1=Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Moderately Disagree; 4= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5=Moderately Agree; 6=Agree; 7=Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: Black people should not marry interracially.
Notes: 1=Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Moderately Disagree; 4= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5=Moderately Agree; 6=Agree; 7=Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: Blacks are not respected by the broader society.
Notes: 1=Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Moderately Disagree; 4= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5=Moderately Agree; 6=Agree; 7=Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: I feel that the Black community has made valuable contributions to this society.
Notes: 1=Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Moderately Disagree; 4= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5=Moderately Agree; 6=Agree; 7=Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: In general, being Black is an important part of my self-image.
Notes: 1=Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Moderately Disagree; 4= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5=Moderately Agree; 6=Agree; 7=Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: I feel that Blacks have made major accomplishments and advancements.
Notes: 1=Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Moderately Disagree; 4= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5=Moderately Agree; 6=Agree; 7=Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: My destiny is tied to the destiny of other Black people.
Notes: 1=Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Moderately Disagree; 4= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5=Moderately Agree; 6=Agree; 7=Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: Blacks who espouse separatism are as racist as White people who also espouse separatism.
Notes: 1=Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Moderately Disagree; 4= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5=Moderately Agree; 6=Agree; 7=Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: Black students are better off going to schools that are controlled and organized by Blacks.
Notes: 1=Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Moderately Disagree; 4= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5=Moderately Agree; 6=Agree; 7=Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: Being Black is unimportant to my sense of what kind of person I am.
Notes: 1=Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Moderately Disagree; 4= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5=Moderately Agree; 6=Agree; 7=Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: I feel good about being a member of my racial/ethnic group
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Neutral; 4= Agree; 5= Strongly agree

ElementDescription: I am happy that I am a member of my racial/ethnic group
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Neutral; 4= Agree; 5= Strongly agree

ElementDescription: I have a lot of pride in my racial/ethnic group and its accomplishments
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Neutral; 4= Agree; 5= Strongly agree

ElementDescription: I feel that my racial/ethnic group has made valuable contributions to this society
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Neutral; 4= Agree; 5= Strongly agree
